channel.title: Google Maps on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in Google Maps on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Google Maps v3 marker.set_map deprecated
item.description: After the 8.8 earthquake outside of Chile this past weekend, I posted my Quake Tracker to twitter/facebook so people could easily visualize where the quake occurred.

item.title: Quake Tracker using Google Maps API v3 and XML/Atom feed
item.description: http://www.ipreferjim.com/maps/quakes.html For this, I used the following: Google Maps API v3 (http://code.google.com/apis/maps/documentation/v3/) jQuery v1.3.2 (http://jquery.com/) First, you will need to include the google maps api in your header:
